info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:52AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hancock and McDonough Counties through 915 AM CST... At 852 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bowen, or 15 miles south of Carthage, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Macomb, Colchester, Augusta, Bowen, Industry, Good Hope, Bardolph, West Point, Tennessee, Sciota, Western Illinois University, Fandon, Colmar, Adair, Plymouth, Denver, Bentley, Macomb Municipal Airport, Stillwell and McDonough County 4-H Grounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
